subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Sergio García was tied with Marc Leishman at six under after 18 holes at Augusta National. Twenty-one of the top 30 players in the world, including Tiger Woods and Rory McIlory, were within six strokes of the lead.
snippet: Sergio García was tied with Marc Leishman at six under after 18 holes at Augusta National. Twenty-one of the top 30 players in the world, including Tiger Woods and Rory McIlory, were within six strokes of the lead.
